description: vase or bottle with bulbous base and long neck; pouring spout in lip; floral decoration around base; band of geometric design at top of base; two floral motifs on neck; narrow band at top of neck
markings: on bottom, on labels: [52D], [JOSEPH V. VIZCARRA / Page 2 / #1 / Collection -] and [D.M. & P. MANHEIM / BRISTOL / CIRCA 1760 / GUARANTEED GENUINE]; on bottom: collector\'s label
title: Bottle jug
